name: Tales Of Demons And Gods
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManga
content: Nie Li, one of the strongest Demon Spiritist in his past life standing at the pinnacle of the martial world , however he lost his life during the battle with Sage Emperor and the six deity ranked beast, his soul was then reborn back in time back to when he is still 13. Although heâ€™s the weakest in his class with the lowest talent at only Red soul realm, with the aid of the vast knowledge which he accumulated in his previous life, he trained faster then anyone.
